bibl.title: Tiresias in Euripides' Bacchae and the Author of the Derveni Papyrus.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Introduction. - The rationalistic discourse of Tiresias in Euripides' Bacchae (286-301). - Sophistic elements in Tiresias' speech. - Parallels with the Derveni Papyrus. - The character of Tiresias and of the author of the Derveni Papyrus.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Santamaría Marco Antonio, Tiresias in Euripides' Bacchae and the Author of the Derveni Papyrus.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 677-684.

Introduction. - The rationalistic discourse of Tiresias in Euripides' Bacchae (286-301). - Sophistic elements in Tiresias' speech. - Parallels with the Derveni Papyrus. - The character of Tiresias and of the author of the Derveni Papyrus.
